content.text:
# Empirical Software Engineering__disambig_2

Empirical Software Engineering is a peer-reviewed scientific journal published by Springer Nature. It was established in 1996 and covers the area of empirical software engineering. The editors-in-chief are [http://www.robertfeldt.net Robert Feldt] and [http://thomas-zimmermann.com Thomas Zimmermann].
Abstracting and indexing
The journal is abstracted and indexed in the Science Citation Index Expanded and Current Contents/Engineering, Computing & Technology. According to the Journal Citation Reports, the journal has a 2021 impact factor of 3.762.
Past Editors in Chief
* Lionel Briand (University of Ottawa).
* Victor Basili (University of Maryland).
* Warren Harrison (Portland State University).
See also
* List of computer science journals
* List of engineering journals and magazines
* IEEE Transactions on Software Engineering
